task.title: Generate a Dashboard Report
task.shortdesc: Reports help you make conclusions on your publishing process.

context.p: Each report is a collection of data that can be used to form an objective, and complete picture of the efficiency of your overall publishing process.

step.cmd: Under the Report Name field, enter a user friendly name for the report.
From the Dashboard drop-down, select the appropriate dashboard for which you want to generate the report.
From the Size drop-down, select the maximum amount of time you want to spend generating the report.

taskbody.result: When Jupiter finishes generating the report, a Save As dialog displays.
